ValidationRule.description: Certain fields should not contain special characters otherwise they can not be properly vetted and cleaned by Data.com Clean
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Alias <> "autocln", $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, $User.Id <> "0051300000C418v", OR( CONTAINS(FirstName , '/'), CONTAINS(FirstName , '\\'), CONTAINS(FirstName , ';'), CONTAINS(FirstName , '|'), CONTAINS(FirstName , ':'), CONTAINS(LastName, '/'), CONTAINS(LastName, '\\'), CONTAINS(LastName, ';'), CONTAINS(LastName, '|'), CONTAINS(LastName, ':'), CONTAINS(Phone, '/'), CONTAINS(Phone, '\\'), CONTAINS(Phone, ';'), CONTAINS(Phone, '|'), CONTAINS(Phone, ':'), CONTAINS(City, '/'), CONTAINS(City, '\\'), CONTAINS(City, ';'), CONTAINS(City, '|'), CONTAINS(City, ':'), CONTAINS(Email, '/'), CONTAINS(Email, '\\'), CONTAINS(Email, ';'), CONTAINS(Email, '|'), CONTAINS(Email, ':'), CONTAINS(Company, '\\'), CONTAINS(Company, ';'), CONTAINS(Company, '|'), CONTAINS(Company, ':') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lead Name, Company, Phone, Email, and City cannot contain the following special characters: / | \ ; :
